question: Which country's team has won the 2017 Asian Team Snooker Championship?
explanation: India\'s leading cueist Pankaj Advani teamed up with Laxman Rawat to demolish Pakistan in the final of the Asian Team Snooker Championship by 3-0 in Bishskek, Kyrgyszstan on July 5, 2017. With the title and the win in the final, Advani remained the only player not to lose a single individual match in the team event. This title brings up Advani\'s second Asian title this season and 8th overall while it was a first major first international title for Rawat.
